channel.title: Steve Dorner on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Steve Dorner on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: A Eulogy for Eudora
item.description: Today in Tedium: Email is such a pain in the butt. (Hopefully not this specific email.) Weâ€™ve been doing everything in our power to fight the influence it has on our lives, to minimize the spam, the marketing, the burden. That burden leads lots of folks to fruitlessly hunt for the perfect email client like I hunt for the perfect word processor. Others have followed the path of least resistance: Either Gmail or Outlook.
